髗字的基本解释

髗
lú
古同“颅”。

髗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lú］
［《廣韻》落胡切，平模，來。］
“颅1”的繁体字。亦作“髗1”。
(1)头盖骨。
(2)头，头颅。
(3)指额头。

髗字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【骨字部】　髗； 康熙笔画：26； 页码：页1451第19
【廣韻】落胡切【集韻】龍都切，?音盧。與顱同。【唐書·張九齡傳】髗足旁午。【釋音】髗，頭髗。

髗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
髗字的起名意思

暂无。

髗
Basic explanation of words
髗
lú
The ancient same "cranial".
髗
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lú]
["Guangyun" Luo Huqie, flat model, come. ]
Traditional characters for "cranial 1". Also known as "髗1".
(1) The skull.
(2) Head, skull.
(3) Refers to the forehead.
髗
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Haiji 1] [Bone Character Department] 　髗; Kangxi Strokes: 26; Page Number: Page 1451 Page 19
[Guang Yun] Luo Hu Qi [Ji Yun] Long Du Qi,? Yin Lu. Same as the skull. [Book of Tang·Biography of Zhang Jiuling] Noon beside the feet. [Release the sound] 髗, head 髗.
